title: Honest Ed's sells its signs
content:
[http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/honest-ed-s-sells-its-signs-1.2564...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414181644/http:/www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/honest-ed-s-sells-its-signs-1.2564440?cmp=rss "http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/toronto/honest-ed-s-sells-its-signs-1.2564440?cmp=rss")

Honest Ed's is a discount store and long time fixture in Downtown Toronto since 1948. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Honest\_Ed's  
They are closing now so someone can build - you guessed it, A condo.

they were one of the last places to employ sign painters to do their in-house signs and advertising.  
 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hOrAeW7soVI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414181644/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=hOrAeW7soVI "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hOrAeW7soVI")
author: russellm
